attributes.additional_details:
Bring back British Railways, there are so many obvious reasons to do so since the Beeching Plan. Restoration of this would dramatically increase so many aspects of our nation including:
• Tourism (including to coastal towns that are desperately in need of investment)
• Business & employee transport from surrounding areas & less road traffic
• Return of British engineering firms to major cities
• Stop franchising running with profit
• Stop franchises from bidding too much and raising prices to pay it back
• Lead us forward into an economically friendly future
• Refuse anything less than a network that symbolises what was the birth of our modern nation
• The amount of passengers each year has been rising significantly, an opportunity that would be scandalous not to support.
• We hosted the 2012 olympics, and we found hidden pride for our own nation- now let's pounce on it.
• We already have the infrastructure
